Class SimpleLogFormatter

  1. java.lang.Object
  2. java.util.logging.Formatter
  3. org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.logging.SimpleLogFormatter
  1. public class SimpleLogFormatter
  2. extends java.util.logging.Formatter
SimpleLogFormatter prints a single line log record in human readable form.
